TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Glyph extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 表示一个由 管理的用户界面 (UI) 实体。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 唯一目的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>是绘制和命中测试。 A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>不具有窗口句柄 (HWND) 所呈现的装饰器控件上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。 每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>可以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>与之关联。 成功通过命中测试<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>有机会推送一个新的或不同<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>到的行为堆栈<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。
有关详细信息，请参阅[行为服务概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7c60cc41-4324-46b5-b444-b39eda7cb33f)。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建你自己<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>基于类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>与之关联。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Bounds%2A>若要创建具有特定维度和位置的标志符号。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.Cursor GetHitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point p) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetHitTest (p As Point) As Cursor

Docs.returns: 如果 与 关联，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A>方法是`abstract`方法，它强制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>实现提供命中的测试逻辑。 如果给定的任何时刻，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>决定，位置，它将需要返回一个有效的情况下与涉及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Cursor>。 否则，返回`null`将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>忽略该位置。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.GetHitTest%2A>以查看该点是否在此标志符号。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/cpp/Form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Paint(class System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs pe) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Paint (pe As PaintEventArgs)

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A>方法是`abstract`方法，它强制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>实现提供的绘制逻辑。 `pe`参数包含<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>的装饰器窗口相关<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph.Paint%2A>用于绘制标志符号。 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>类。
